Web Applications

Features

Fast Delivery

It takes me much less time to build your project; I only work on only one website at a time. This shortens the development time.

High Quality

I use all my knowledge to improve your website; I test it many times for bugs, responsiveness flaws to make it perfect before submitting it to you for further recommedations.

Inexpensive

My services do not cost very much; it is affordable to everyone. If you have a limited budget, I may provide a discount.

Customer Support

You will be supported with your website technically for 2 years from the release date of the product. This is completely free.

About

About Me

I am an Angren-based 18yo junior web-designer. By learning how to create, manage, and improve website UIs, I now plan to practise and sharpen my skills. In the near future, I indent to learn to use graphic tools: Adobe XD, Photoshop, and Figma so that I will become a full-featured designer.

Outside my job, my hobbies include Reading Books, Chess, as well as Tutoring. I used to teach my peers prior to my current activity. I regularly play chess online at lichess.com.
